item.title: Bio
item.description: Jordan Duabe — @j4ckofalltrades I’m a programmer, Linux geek, and command-line ninja from the ðŸ‡µðŸ‡­, currently based in ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡º. The majority of my work experience has been writing code for web and mobile apps in a variety of programming languages and frameworks but I’ve also worked on DevOps-related stuff like setting up server environments and CI/CD pipelines. When I’m not writing code – I’m either playing DotA or gaming on the Switch, tinkering with Raspberry Pi’s, or learning to play the ukulele.
